title: Automation metabug

labels.name: metabug
labels.description: Issues about issues themselves ("bugs about bugs")

body:
Unprioritized list of automation tasks.
- [x] bundling mingw https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/11782
- [x] fully test windows https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16457
- [x] rev1 mingw-w64 64-bit toolchain https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17394
- [x] rust/cargo install https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16456
- [x] release channel https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16677
- [x] out of sync nightlies https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/14431
- [x] feature staging https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16678
- [x] valgrind https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/13217
- [ ] testing 32 bit on distcheck https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17344
- [x] 32-bit cargo on CentOS
- [x] OSX auto builds are segfaulting (no issue)
- [x] high-5 https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16674
- [x] merging win32/64 bots https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17354
- [x] cloudfare sync is weird https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16649
- [x] msys2 win32 https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17347
- [ ] lexer tests https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/15880
- [x] benchmark bot https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/12458
- [x] lldb tests https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16112
- [ ] test more OS X https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17269
- [x] OSX is segfaulting with nightlies https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16489
- [ ] more android slaves https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/16795
- [x] increase builds/slave https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17395
- [ ] doc/master -> doc/nightly https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17398
- [x] license packaging https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/17690
- [x] doc installation https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/14916
- [x] shutdown idle slaves https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/18151
- [x] losing windows slaves https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/18703
- [x] nightlies running at wrong time https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/18912
- [x] stability upload fails incorrectly https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19079
- [x] remove metrics infra https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19145
- [x] doc tools on dist bots https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19200
- [x] mac minis -> macstadium https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19286
- [x] guidelines https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19315
- [x] rust-by-example https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19455
- [x] release signing https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/13252
- [x] snap signing https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/13254
- [ ] upload rustup.sh https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19505
- [ ] test 'make install' https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19698
- [x] install an uninstall script https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20283
- [ ] fix dist security https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20629
- [ ] package dbg std https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20630
- [x] directory listings https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20838
- [x] update rustup for beta https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/21149
- [ ] install source https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19535
- [ ] get rid of cloudfront https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/21239
- [ ] cargo dist dir https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/21240
- [x] machine readable dist index https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/21241

- [x] ec2 spot instances https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/21904
